post:
Introducing DireVPS. Carefully oversold OpenVZ VPS to keep your prices low.

**The deal**

£4.00/month per 4GB RAM, 1GB vSwap, 100GB Disk space, 2000GB monthly data transfer. Two IPv6 addresses. One IPv4 for a limited time (usually zero IPv4 other than an internat/NAT address).

**Specs**

RapidSwitch Datacentre (Maidenhead, UK)
4x 10k RPM in Hardware RAID10 with BBU

**Disclaimer**

Management decision is final. We may terminate service without refund as we see fit if we feel you are abusing it.

**More info**

Please see our website at [DireVPS.com](http://www.DireVPS.com)

**Order URL**

https://clients.openitc.co.uk/order/product/399

Now in true DireVPS fashion we may not answer any questions you have. If we do we, we may have to wait a few days first ;)
